candidates.name: Aaron Rivera

experience.description: Played a lead role in the critically acclaimed production 'City of Secrets,' showcasing emotional depth and versatility.
Provided voiceover for the main character in the animated series 'Echoes of Light,' praised for expressive delivery.

funfact: Has studied method acting for 5 years.
Taught improvisation workshops for young actors.
Occasionally performs spoken-word poetry.

candidates.name: Damian Laurent

experience.description: Played a wizard in the hit stage adaptation 'The Enchanted Grove,' winning Best Supporting Actor.
Directed the play 'A Solitary Mind,' lauded for its gripping narrative and compelling performances.

funfact: Enjoys crafting costumes for stage performances.
Fluent in three languages, often takes multilingual roles.
Has trained in fencing for action scenes.

candidates.name: Diane Hargrove

experience.description: Uncredited background extra in 'Dark Streets,' appearing briefly in crowd scenes.
Worked as a waitress at 'Sunny Diner,' unrelated to acting but claimed as a role-playing experience.

funfact: Claims to have acted in multiple productions but offers no supporting references.
Frequently exaggerates skills in applications.
Confuses industry terms like 'monologue' and 'soliloquy.'

candidates.name: Dondon Carter

experience.description: Starred as the comedic lead in 'Laugh Out Loud,' praised for impeccable timing and humor.
Led workshops for aspiring comedians, focusing on quick thinking and audience engagement.

funfact: Has a background in musical theater and plays the piano.
Often collaborates with other actors on creative projects.
Loves creating parody scripts in spare time.

candidates.name: Ellen Montgomery

experience.description: Managed a small online fashion page with minimal acting relevance.
Claimed to star in 'The Hidden Path,' but the production does not appear to exist.

funfact: Often boasts about non-existent achievements.
Inconsistent attendance at auditions and rehearsals.
Limited understanding of basic acting principles.

candidates.name: Jamie Patel

experience.description: Played a key supporting role in 'Love in the Park,' known for delivering heartfelt and relatable performances.
Collaborated on script development for the play 'Fragments of Us,' ensuring narrative coherence.

funfact: Has a degree in Theater Studies.
Enjoys volunteering to coach young actors.
Prefers intimate stage productions to large-scale performances.

candidates.name: Sashi Delacroix

experience.description: Played a minor role in 'Night of Shadows,' but struggled to maintain character consistency.
Wrote articles unrelated to acting, claiming the experience improved 'character development skills.'

funfact: Prefers solo work and avoids ensemble projects.
Often misses deadlines for role preparations.
Has inconsistent feedback from past directors.

candidates.name: Tina Al-Farouk

experience.description: Played the lead in 'Steel Resolve,' known for performing her own stunts and captivating audiences.
Choreographed dance routines for 'Dance of Dreams,' praised for creativity and energy.

funfact: Skilled in various martial arts.
Fluent in three languages, often plays international roles.
Passionate about mentoring aspiring stunt performers.
